object.name: unpinAllForumTopicMessages
object.description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a forum topic in a forum supergroup chat or a private chat with a user. In the case of a supergroup chat the bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the can_pin_messages administrator right in the supergroup. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a forum topic in a forum supergroup chat or a private chat with a user. In the case of a supergroup chat the bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the can_pin_messages administrator right in the supergroup. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to clear the list of pinned messages in a forum topic in a forum supergroup chat or a private chat with a user. In the case of a supergroup chat the bot must be an administrator in the chat for this to work and must have the *can_pin_messages* administrator right in the supergroup. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format @supergroupusername)
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target supergroup (in the format :code:`@supergroupusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target message thread of the forum topic
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread of the forum topic
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target message thread of the forum topic
annotations.name: message_thread_id
